it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.controller.requests

Class RequestManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.controller.requests.RequestManager

  • public class RequestManager
extends Object
    Responsible for managing the ChoiceRequest sent to the view and for providing a way for their responses to complete the choices.

    The class keeps a map with all the completable choices associated to pending request. When a request is completed(cancelled) its CompletableChoice is completed(cancelled) and it is then removed from the internal map.

    Author:
    Alessandro Fulgini

    • Constructor Detail

      • RequestManager

        public RequestManager()
        Creates an empty RequestManager

    • Method Detail

      • insertRequest

        public <T extends Serializable> CompletableChoice<T> insertRequest(ChoiceRequest<T> request)
                                                            throws DuplicateIdException
        Receives a choice request and returns a CompletableChoice which can be used to retrieve the chosen object when this is provided by completing the CompletableChoice. The completion can be done by calling completeRequest(String, Object)
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the choice
        Parameters:
        request - the request that has to be inserted
        Returns:
        an object which can be used to retrieve the choice
        Throws:
        DuplicateIdException - if a request with the same uuid is pending

      • completeRequest

        public void completeRequest(String uuid,
                            Object choice)
                     throws UnknownIdException,
                            InvalidChoiceException
        Given the UUID of the request, attempt to complete the associated choice. This method will check if the choice is valid based on the request and if it is valid it will make the choice available via CompletableChoice.get(). If the choice completes successfully, it will be deleted from the pending map.
        Parameters:
        uuid - unique identifier of the request whose choice has to be completed
        choice - the object which represents the choice
        Throws:
        UnknownIdException - if no CompletableChoice associated to the UUID can be found
        InvalidChoiceException - f the choice is invalid (not accepted by the request)

      • cancelRequest

        public boolean cancelRequest(String uuid)
        Attempts to cancel the choice request. This attempt will fail if the request (i.e. its CompletableChoice) has already been completed. In case the cancellation is successful, anyone waiting on that choice to complete will get a CancellationException. This method also removes the choices from the pending map. If you try to cancel a request that does not exist (already completed or never inserted) the method will simply return false.
        Parameters:
        uuid - identifier of the request you want to cancel
        Returns:
        true if the request was correctly cancelled, false if the request could not be cancelled

      • cancelPendingRequests

        public void cancelPendingRequests()
        Cancels all the pending requests in this manager.

        This is particularly useful when a player does not respond. When the timeout is reached, the pending request(s) should be cleared out before passing the turn over, so that the request doesn't get stuck in the manager forever.

      • isRequestPending

        public boolean isRequestPending(String uuid)
        Checks if a pending request with the given UUID is saved in the manager
        Parameters:
        uuid - unique identifier of the request
        Returns:
        true if the request is pending, false otherwise

      • hasPendingRequests

        public boolean hasPendingRequests()
        Returns whether there are pending requests or not
        Returns:
        true if there are pending requests, false otherwise

      • getPendingChoice

        public CompletableChoice getPendingChoice(String uuid)
        Returns the pending choice associated to given request UUID.

        Please note that this method does not remove the choice from the internal map, if it gets completed and also that the return type has no type parameter, so the casting will be unchecked. Completion/cancellation of the requests should always be performed with completeRequest(String, Object) and cancelRequest(String).

        Parameters:
        uuid - the unique identifier of the request that originated the choice
        Returns:
        the pending choice if it is found, null if no request is found with given UUID
